summary: Integration test module that validates the Conan CLI 'info' command across a wide range of scenarios, including basic and advanced output handling, package path resolution, custom deployment logic, editable components, error propagation in dependency graphs, field filtering, and JSON formatted results.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the 'info' command in the Conan package manager by exercising its functionality under diverse conditions, thereby preventing regressions and ensuring reliable user experience.
